text: Grzegorz Borawski (born 2 November 1967) is a retired Polish football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:GKS Katowice players Category:GKS Jastrzębie players Category:Association football defenders Category:People from Czechowice-Dziedzice
title: Grzegorz Borawski
